entry.title: New Satina Duck Smooth Poly Satin Drapery Fabric
entry.summary:
Vendor: Toto Fabric
Type: Drapery Fabric
Price: 1.00 - 6.25 (2 variants)

The Description

Get the elegant look and feel of satin without paying the price. The solid polyester satin weave in turquoise or myrtle green will make a stunning drapery fabric with a delicate, silky sheen.

Split Bolt: The inventory of this fabric is made of multiple pieces. Orders will be completed with the largest continuous sizes available. Call or email for current sizes.
